titleStmt.title: Laus pediculi: or An apologeticall speech, directed to the vvorshipfull masters and vvardens of Beggars Hall. Written in Latine by the learned Daniel Heinsius. And from thence translated into English by Iames Guitard, Gentleman
Laus pediculi. English
titleStmt.author: Heinsius, Daniel, 1580-1655.
Guitard, James.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
